title: Here in Ocean Isle Beach, an extension to Georgetown road is still not finished despite being worked on for close to a year.  Nor is the circle at the Shallotte end of that road complete. Why Iis this less than four mile stretch of new road taking so long to finish?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/06/when-will-the-georgetown-road-extension-project-in-oib-be-finished/
